title: Secondary > primary roll, why ?
body:
Why m i getting more secondary roll than my primary ? Since last patch i m getting my main roll once in 5 games. Even in promos i sometimes get more secondary than primary. 
Is it that hard to make at least 1 min longer q, just so i can get my roll, instead of just giving me second one over and over again... i just want to play my main roll more than secondary... pls
